name: Virtual Drive '96
description:
In a macrovisual 3D experience, pilot The 96 through a virtual vaporwave wonderland full of remnants and statues who wish to download your data

reach the finish line before all your virtual drive data is processed

collect new data in the form of Compact Discs

chill in your euphoric future, recover the Penultimate Data Disc

All Music by Stevia Sphere, CC BY 4.0 - https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/
